entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , New Carlisle
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:28 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: New Carlisle 08:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

Humidity: 94 %

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Risk of freezing rain late this afternoon. Local blowing snow late this afternoon. Snowfall amount 25 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Risk of freezing rain this evening. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
